name: Swayam Group
description:
Swayam is a thought-leader in diverse IT solutions, consulting and service arena. We are pioneering offering many path-breaking services, solutions, offshore software development for businesses across globe.
Founded in year 2002 by founding members who believed in innovation, agility and business focused solution offering as core value system.
During the journey close to a decade, we pioneered offering many path-breaking services and solutions to wide range of organisations from a budding start-up to multinational corporates. During the course we practised continues development and improvement of processes as core to always keep focus on value addition we offer to customer.
We have a history of successful software product development and bespoke application development partnerships with clients and associate companies in India, Europe, USA and South Africa. We have accomplished successful track record of developing and implementing comprehensive software products, line of businesses and in providing consultancy services.
Cohesively, we have been offering end-to-end IT services and consulting support for valued clients in these regions in the Enterprise Applications in Health Care, Oil and Gas, Logistics and Financial domains. We have accomplished successful track record of developing and implementing comprehensive software products.
We are offering the entire gamut of products, services, solutions and application on wide variety of technology development platforms, programming languages, integration methodologies, service delivery models, solution implementation techniques, enterprise wide applications and so on.
We commit ourselves to deliver your expectations on 4 key areas:
" Innovation, Time, Cost and Quality! "
